name: AirPods Firmware Update 5E133
available: AirPods (2nd generation and later), AirPods Pro (all models), AirPods Max

advisories.impact: When your headphones are seeking a connection request to one of your previously paired devices, an attacker in Bluetooth range might be able to spoof the intended source device and gain access to your headphones.
advisories.description: An authentication issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Yun-hao Chung and Archie Pusaka of Google ChromeOS
